info.title: tryLocateResultTx example
info.description: This is an API example for tryLocateResultTx, a method to locate the result transaction in the TON blockchain based on source, destination, and logical time of the original transaction.

parameters.name: source
parameters.description: The source address of the original transaction

parameters.name: destination
parameters.description: The destination address of the original transaction

parameters.name: created_lt
parameters.description: The logical time when the original transaction was created

200.description: Information about the located result transaction

workchain.description: The workchain ID of the block containing the result transaction

shard.description: The shard ID of the block containing the result transaction

seqno.description: The sequence number of the block containing the result transaction

root_hash.description: The root hash of the block containing the result transaction

file_hash.description: The file hash of the block containing the result transaction

lt.description: The logical time of the result transaction

hash.description: The hash of the result transaction
